summary: The ineffable dumbasses Also holy crap my last post blew up (thank you Mr. Gaiman for validating my dumb ideas), I feel bad that...
caption:
The ineffable dumbasses

Also holy crap my last post blew up (thank you Mr. Gaiman for validating my dumb ideas), I feel bad that I can’t respond to everyone and do little drawings for all the other suggestions (I’m a bit overwhelmed with it all, I’ve never had a post pass even 200 notes before so…) but hello to the new people following me!

Uhh I don’t really know how to end this little ramble so here’s the drawing I guess

tags: the great comic relief bake off
title: Michael Sheen’s winning pavlova
body:
To celebrate Midsummer’s Eve, I made Michael Sheen’s Bake Off winning lemon curd & passion fruit pavlova. 

It goes especially well with a cup of tea and a side of Good Omens…
